title: Comprehensive version-numbering scheme design
body:
Right now we have a few different styles of version number embedded in different places--FileVersion, AssemblyVersion, nuget package versions, VSIX version . . .

It'd be nice if there was a coherent design that let these match as much as possible.

nodes.body: It'd be nice if this included some consideration of #918.
Another requirement here is to stamp all our dlls with the commit they came from. We lost this ability at some point.

The dlls from the nuget packages do not have them:

![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/2255729/19814679/23e1bbc0-9cf4-11e6-879e-1e4173b57386.png)
Splitting the more-severe no-version-stamp problem out from the larger "make everything match".
